alert.note: Alert for Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 12:28AM CST until February 20 at 9:38AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Missouri... Black River near Annapolis. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River near Annapolis. * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding begins along County Road 146 Champion Springs Road... the road leading to the gage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 PM CST Thursday the stage was 14.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:15 PM CST Thursday was 14.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 15.5 feet this morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Black River Annapolis 8.0 14.9 Thu 11 pm 8.5 6.4 5.7 5.4 MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
